short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GreenEarth Rewards offsets your carbon footprint, for free, and saves you money with automatic discount codes when you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸŒŽ SHOP CARBON NEUTRAL AT NO EXTRA COST ðŸŒŽ 

GreenEarth Rewards gets 30,000+ stores to offset your carbon footprint, at no extra cost, when you shop online! You can help combat climate change, for free, by supporting one of our great carbon offset projects. 

ðŸŒŽ SAVE MONEY WITH AUTOMATIC DISCOUNTS ðŸŒŽ 

This extension also saves you time and money by testing all available discount codes, when you reach the checkout page, and automatically applying the one that saves you the most money. 

ðŸŒŽ HOW IT WORKS ðŸŒŽ 

Just shop online as you normally would.  When you reach a partner website, youâ€™ll activate GreenEarth Rewards with one click. This triggers our partner to pay us a commission when you make a purchase (or complete some other action). We use that commission to fund support your chosen carbon offset projects, offsetting your carbon footprint â€“ for free. 

ðŸŒŽ YOUR PRIVACY IS IMPORTANT ðŸŒŽ 

The GreenEarth Rewards extension does not collect any of your personal information or payment details. It does not view your emails or record your searches. Also, we never sell your data to advertisers or other third parties. 

ðŸŒŽ YOUR ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT ðŸŒŽ 

By using this extension, you will be directly helping combat climate change. The money we earn from this system goes directly towards the carbon offset project of your choice (see them Ã  https://rewards.greeningtheearth.com/projects). We retain part of the revenue to build and maintain our free tools. 

If you create a GreenEarth Rewards account, and sign into your account through the extension, your activity will be recorded to your account, and you will receive email notifications of you impact.   

ðŸŒŽ WHO WE ARE ðŸŒŽ 

Greening the Earth (GTE) is an agricultural program that generates internationally accredited carbon offsets from soil carbon by restoring the natural capital of marginal and climatically impacted Australian farmland. This free browser extension helps us raise money to support our carbon offset projects. 

ðŸŒŽ REQUIRED PERMISSIONS ðŸŒŽ 

"Read and change all your data on the websites you visit" Ã  so that our extension can automatically recognize when you visit a partner website and apply discount codes for you. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the GreenEarth Rewards extension and the Privacy Policy (https://rewards.greeningtheearth.com/privacy) and Terms of Service (https://rewards.greeningtheearth.com/terms)
